edu.unika.aifb.foam.combination
Interface Combination

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Averaging, BestValue, ComplexCombination, DecisionTree, MachineLearn, ManualWeightsLinear, ManualWeightsSigmoid, PetriCombination
public interface Combination
extends java.io.Serializable

Combinations are used to aggregate the output of individual rules. This can be done with a manual approach or a machine learned approach.

Author:
Marc Ehrig
